instrumentOrServiceDescription: Equipped with 7 PCR thermocyclers, one ABI 3130 capillary sequencer, two laminar flow workbenches, two flatbed multiphor electrophoresis set-ups (e.g. for SSCP-analysis), several units for flatbed submarine agarose gel electrophoresis, digital cameras and photographic equipment for gel documentation (including UV-photography), four ultrafreezers (-80¡C), five portable liquid nitrogen dry shipping containers, etc. The unit also disposes of several PCs and Macintosh computers for data treatment. There is a specialized library and key-word driven, electronic, reprint collection with >55,000 titles, about 11,000 of which are available as PDF.
